meanings.definition: In a bold and daring manner
meanings.sent1: She climbed the tree adventurously, reaching the top with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: He explored the cave adventurously, eager to discover hidden treasures.
meanings.sent3: The cat adventurously chased after a butterfly, leaping through the grass.
meanings.sent4: The young artist adventurously mixed colors on the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The hiker adventurously navigated the rugged terrain, enjoying the challenge.

meanings.definition: With a spirit of excitement and willingness to take risks
meanings.sent1: The adventurous explorer led the group adventurously through the dense jungle.
meanings.sent2: She had an adventurously positive attitude towards trying new things.
meanings.sent3: The adventurously decorated cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His adventurously styled outfit turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The team tackled the project adventurously, embracing the unknown with enthusiasm.
